name: CommandGroupPlacement
desc: Identifier types for standard locations that new command groups can be placed relative to.

items.name: static let appInfo: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that provide information about the app, the terms of the user’s license agreement, etc.

items.name: static let appSettings: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that expose app settings and preferences.

items.name: static let appTermination: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that result in app termination.

items.name: static let appVisibility: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that control the visibility of running apps.

items.name: static let systemServices: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that expose services provided by other apps.

items.name: static let importExport: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that relate to importing and exporting data using formats that the app doesn’t natively support.

items.name: static let newItem: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that create and open different kinds of documents.

items.name: static let printItem: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands related to printing app content.

items.name: static let saveItem: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that save open documents and close windows.

items.name: static let pasteboard: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that interact with the pasteboard and manipulate content that is currently selected in the app’s view hierarchy.

items.name: static let textEditing: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that manipulate and transform text selections.

items.name: static let textFormatting: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that manipulate and transform the styles applied to text selections.

items.name: static let undoRedo: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that control the Undo Manager.

items.name: static let sidebar: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that control the app’s sidebar and full screen modes.

items.name: static let toolbar: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that manipulate the toolbar.

items.name: static let windowArrangement: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that arrange all of an app’s windows.

items.name: static let windowList: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that describe and reveal the app’s open windows.

items.name: static let windowSize: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that control the size of the window.

items.name: static let help: CommandGroupPlacement
items.desc: Standard placement for commands that present documentation and helpful information to the user.
